email_body: Look at that blimp! He must eat six meals a day.Are you a "blimp"?Go to  http://www.peakenglish.com/exec/slangSearchForm?command=detail&wordId=33460 to find out!PEAK English (http://www.peakenglish.com ) is the fun place to learn English on the Internet!SEND THIS EMAIL TO A FRIEND!To unsubscribe, send an email to listserv@listserv.dli.com with the message UNSUBSCRIBE DAILYSLANG in the body of the message.Copyright 2002 Distance Learning, Inc.
